name: Simple Golf Club
author: Matthew Linton

sections.description:
Simple Golf Club is an easy way to organize small groups of people to play golf rounds.

Create teams, add players, schedule events, and track player scores using a simple interface.

Too enjoy the full functionality of Simple golf club, try out an SGC compatible theme like Simple Golf Club 2021

For more information, check out the SGC Website

For information on using or designing themes for SGC checkout the Wiki

Third Party

Simple Golf Club relies on the following third party code:

pickadate.js v3.5.6, 2015/04/20
* By Amsul, http://amsul.ca
* Licensed under MIT
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/simplegolfclub directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Simple Golf Club screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
For a complete list of changes see CHANGELOG.TXT

1.6.24

October 19, 2024
– Tested on WP 6.6

short_description: A simple interface to manage a small golf club.
description:
Simple Golf Club is an easy way to organize small groups of people to play golf rounds.

Create teams, add players, schedule events, and track player scores using a simple interface.

Too enjoy the full functionality of Simple golf club, try out an SGC compatible theme like Simple Golf Club 2021

For more information, check out the SGC Website

For information on using or designing themes for SGC checkout the Wiki

Third Party

Simple Golf Club relies on the following third party code:

pickadate.js v3.5.6, 2015/04/20
* By Amsul, http://amsul.ca
* Licensed under MIT

screenshots.caption: Events: Create events for a team at a specific Location. Divide teams into smaller groups for easier round management.
Locations: Keep track of location information including tee statistics for each course.
Teams: Create teams, and keep track of the players on that team.
Players: Add players and assign them to one or more teams.
Score Cards: For each event keep track of player stats by filling in score cards.
Settings: Set defaults and configure the behavior of Simple Golf Club.
